Reviews.Title: “Don't Judge a Book By it's Cover”
Reviews.Author: btctravel
Reviews.Content: original reservation miles road sister hotel studio suites arrived told double bed sleeper sofa reserved week prior told flood victims taking im ok understand emergencies happen options 1 1 queen bed sofa bed 2 transfer sister hotel extended stay deluxe option 2 told extended stay nicer breakfast included outdoor pool arrived excited looked upgraded kept rate dont judge book cover huge stains carpet counter tops dirty kitchen called front desk escorted carpet cleaning fresh paint job air cooling upgraded 2 suite charge perk televisions stayed suite hated canceled reservation gone else couch filthy blanket sit carpet worn dirty wore socks time sheet stain changed front desk dvd advertised cabinets walls look beaten paint job bathroom disgusting believe clean rusty bathtub free breakfast consisted muffins fruit coffee mistake twice
